verbs.description: [ARG0: The aides , James A. Baker and Lisa Page ,] [V: advised] [ARG1: the former director James . B. Comey] [ARG2: on the bureau ’s politically charged investigations into Hillary Clinton and the Trump campaign] .

The aides , James A. Baker and Lisa Page , advised the former director James . B. Comey on the bureau ’s [ARGM-MNR: politically] [V: charged] [ARG1: investigations] into Hillary Clinton and the Trump campaign .
